localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A text editor where you can type dialogues, add emotions (crying, shouting, hatred, polite, out of breath, etc.). Select from a set of voices (hero, villain, AI, merchant, kid, etc.), add background effects, and export as a human-like voice in studio quality.
blogPost.body: A text editor where you can type dialogues, add emotions (crying, shouting, hatred, polite, out of breath, etc.). Select from a set of voices (hero, villain, AI, merchant, kid, etc.), add background effects, and export as a human-like voice in studio quality.
blogPost.title: SimpleSounds - Human-like AI voices
blogPost.author: Tanay Rathore

localize.description: 一个文本编辑器，你可以在这里输入对话，添加情绪（哭泣、喊叫、仇恨、礼貌、出气等）。从一组声音中选择（英雄、反派、AI、商人、小孩等），添加背景效果，并以工作室质量导出为类似人类的声音。
一個文本編輯器，你可以在這裏輸入對話，添加情緒（哭泣、喊叫、仇恨、禮貌、出氣等）。從一組聲音中選擇（英雄、反派、AI、商人、小孩等），添加背景效果，並以工作室質量導出爲類似人類的聲音。

previous.excerpt: Spilldash is a free Google Sheets add-on that lets you automate dashboard building in a new way. Manage dashboard with configurations like a web application but without the complexity. Watch video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7YxYpqDvRM
previous.title: Spilldash - A new and automated way to create reports on Google Sheets

localize.description: Spilldash是一款免费的Google Sheets插件，它可以让你以一种新的方式自动建立仪表盘。管理仪表盘的配置像一个Web应用程序，但没有复杂的。观看视频：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7YxYpqDvRM
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets上创建报告的一种新的、自动化的方式。

localize.description: Spilldash是一款免費的Google Sheets插件，它可以讓你以一種新的方式自動建立儀表盤。管理儀表盤的配置像一個Web應用程序，但沒有複雜的。觀看視頻：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7YxYpqDvRM
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets上創建報告的一種新的、自動化的方式。

next.title: Mochi mobile - Take notes in markdown, study them with spaced repetition

localize.description: Mochi = 间隔重复 + Zettelkasten + Markdown。
localize.tagline: 用标记法做笔记，隔空重复学习。

localize.description: Mochi = 間隔重複 + Zettelkasten + Markdown。
localize.tagline: 用標記法做筆記，隔空重複學習。
